pullRequest.body:
To accommodate this change, right ore condition has been changed to left ore.
This enables us to redefine `Localization` and `LocalizedModule` with `OreLocalization` in the future.


---

It looks good to me, but I would let someone more into the algebra part of mathlib have the last say.

It also seems that many docstrings below need some updating.
Turns out the notation already works. I just thought it didn't.
